actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

official_title: To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to increase the maximum levels of guaranteed single-employer plan benefits, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to revise requirements for single-employer plans to: (1) increase the maximum level of guaranteed benefits; (2) require that certain supplemental benefits not be treated as non-basic benefits; and (3) index maximum guaranteed benefits under plans or amendments not in effect for 60 months.

titles.title: To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to increase the maximum levels of guaranteed single-employer plan benefits, and for other purposes.
